Flow.description:
DB: 18 july - compartmentalise
Flow Description: Flow to Issue PA or Move back to docs when Opp is in Ready for Verification Stage, launched from Wrap Up Opportunity H2 (main flow that houses entire skeleton of working opps)
Front-End Access: Work Opportunity button on the Opportunity page.

formulas.name: Link_Bond
formulas.expression: HYPERLINK("/" & {!bondOppIdVar} , "Click here to Navigate to the Bond Opportunity" , '_top')

formulas.name: Link_PreApproval
formulas.expression: HYPERLINK("/" & {!paIdOppVar} , "Click here to Navigate to the Pre-Approval Opportunity" , '_top')

formulas.name: outstandingDocsMain
formulas.expression: IF({!mainMissingID} = "ID", "ID"+ BR(), null) + IF({!mainMissingPayslip} = "Payslip", "Payslip"+ BR(), null) + IF({!mainMissingBankS} = "Bank Statement", "Bank Statement"+ BR(), null)

Flow.label: Verification - Issue PA Subflow

recordLookups.name: Get_Updated_Opp_back_to_Docs
recordLookups.label: Get Updated Opp back to Docs

recordLookups.name: Get_Updated_Opp_post_ready_ver_0
recordLookups.label: Get Updated Opp post ready ver

value.stringValue: PA issued - awaiting OTP (attach PA certificate)
FHB PA issued - awaiting OTP (attach PA certificate)

fields.name: personTxt
fields.fieldText: The email address has not been populated for the following customer: {!Get_Opportunity.Account.FirstName} {!Get_Opportunity.Account.LastName}

fields.name: capturetxt
fields.fieldText: Please capture the missing information in order to continue with the email send:

fields.name: emailBlankError
fields.fieldText: The Email field is required to continue with the email send.

fields.name: runningNotes
fields.fieldText: Verification Outcome Comment: {!Get_Case_Outcome.Verification_Failure_Comment__c}

fields.name: chooseApplicantAmend
fields.fieldText: Choose the applicant whose financial information you want to review/amend:

fields.name: sendMailTxt
fields.fieldText:
Hi {!Get_Opportunity.Owner.FirstName}!


Below is the preview of the selected email template to send. Upon confirmation, this mail will be sent to: {!Get_Main_Applicant_Docs.First_Name__c} {!Get_Main_Applicant_Docs.Last_Name__c}

fields.name: sendMailTxt_0
fields.fieldText:
Hi {!Get_Opportunity.Owner.FirstName}!


Below is the preview of the selected email template to send. Upon confirmation, this mail will be sent to: {!Get_Main_Applicant_Docs.First_Name__c} {!Get_Main_Applicant_Docs.Last_Name__c}

subflows.label: Close Opportunity Lost or Won - Subflow

subflows.label: Close Opportunity Lost or Won - Subflow

textTemplates.name: chatterPostMessage
textTemplates.text:
<---- Customer Email Sent ---->
Template Selection: {!theTemplate}
Sent To: {!applicantFullName}
Sent From: @[{!$User.Id}]
Sent Date: {!sentTime}
